main event: A civilian reported seeing a red and dark round object, about the size of a basketball, hovering and returning in Omaha, Nebraska.
interesting points: The object was observed hanging in the sky and did not move in a known path,The sighting occurred on 15 March 1953,The duration of the observation was reported as 5 years, although this may be inaccurate,The witness could not identify the object, leading to the conclusion of insufficient data for evaluation,There were various possibilities considered for the object's identification, including a balloon and aircraft.
sighted object: one round object, size of a basketball, red and dark in color
